revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = D-Link DWA-652 rev A1 top.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Xtreme N Notebook Adapter |caption2 = |pp = |sp = http://support.dlink.com/ProductInfo.aspx?m=DWA-652 |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = D-Link |model = DWA-652 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = A1 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = April 15, 2011 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/D-Link_DWA-652_rev_A1 |sernum = |wlclass = N300 |series = |if = PCMCIA (32-bit) |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0023 |subvendor_id = 1186 |subdevice_id = 3a6e |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = KA2DWA645A1,PPD-AR5BCB-00071 |icid = 4216A-DWA645A1 |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:19:5B |chip1 = Atheros;AR5416; |chip2 = Atheros;AR2133; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 04/03/2006 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The A2 revision also shares this FCC ID. :The 00:21:91 OUI (among others) is also used by the A2 revision. As this device appears to use AR2133, the antenna configuration used by the device is presumed to be 2x3:2. {{WiFiCert|WFA5206|07/17/2007}} ===lspci -nnv dump=== 
06:00.0 Network controller [0280]: Qualcomm Atheros AR5416 Wireless Network Adapter [AR5008 802.11(a)bgn] [168c:0023] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: D-Link System Inc Device [1186:3a6e]
        Flags: bus master, 66MHz, medium devsel, latency 168, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=64K]
        Capabilities: [40] #80 [0000]
        Kernel driver in use: ath9k
===ath9k info dump=== 
ath: EEPROM regdomain: 0x10
ath: EEPROM indicates we should expect a direct regpair map
ath: Country alpha2 being used: CO
ath: Regpair used: 0x10
ieee80211 phy25: Selected rate control algorithm 'minstrel_ht'
ieee80211 phy25: Atheros AR5416 MAC/BB Rev:2 AR2133 RF Rev:81 mem=0xffffc900077a0000, irq=19
